definition[0]: a new idea, method, or invention
definition[1]: the introduction of new ideas or methods
example[1]: We must encourage innovation if the company is to remain competitive.
example[2]: Many people feel bewildered by the speed of technological innovation.
example[3]: We need to encourage innovation in industry.
example[4]: It is a fairly recent innovation for rent to be paid in advance.
example[5]: the technical innovations which research could deliver to the economy
example[7]: Mr. Bohn planned to accelerate the pace of technological innovation at Porsche.
